K10D0122_H0124:225b-1: a'arya a'ata dzny'a na n'a ma ma h'a y'a s'u tra /
K10D0122_H0124:225b-3: 'phags pa 'da' ka ye shes zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo /
K10D0122_H0124:226a-1: chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo //
K10D0122_H0124:226a-2: 'di skad bdag gis thos ba dus gcig na /
K10D0122_H0124:226a-3: bcom ldan 'das 'og min lha'i rgyal po'i khang bzang
K10D0122_H0124:226a-4: na bzhugs te 'khor thams cad la chos ston pa
K10D0122_H0124:226a-5: dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
K10D0122_H0124:226a-6: nam mkha'i snying pos bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal
K10D0122_H0124:226a-9: byang chub sems dpa' nam 'chi kha ma'i sems ji ltar blta bar bgyi /
K10D0122_H0124:226a-10: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10D0122_H0124:226a-11: nam mkha'i snying po; ;byang chub sems dpa' nam 'chi
K10D0122_H0124:226a-12: ba'i dus kyi tsha 'da' ga ye shes bsgom par
K10D0122_H0124:226a-13: bya'o // de la 'da' ga ye shes ni /
K10D0122_H0124:226a-14: chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag pas
K10D0122_H0124:226a-15: na; dngos po med pa'i 'du shes rab tu bsgom
K10D0122_H0124:226a-16: par bya'o // chos thams cad byang chub kyi sems su 'dus pas na /
K10D0122_H0124:226a-17: snying rje chen po'i 'du shes rab tu bsgom par bya'o //
K10D0122_H0124:226a-18: chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal bas na /
K10D0122_H0124:226a-19: mi dmigs pa'i 'du shes rab tu bsgom par bya'o //
K10D0122_H0124:226a-20: dngos po thams cad mi rtag pas na /
K10D0122_H0124:226a-21: ci la'ang ma chags pa'i 'du shes rab tu bsgom par bya'o //
K10D0122_H0124:226a-22: sems rtogs na ye shes yin pas na /
K10D0122_H0124:226a-23: sangs rgyas gzhan du mi btsal ba'i 'du shes rab tu bsgom par bya'o //
K10D0122_H0124:226b-0: bcom ldan 'das @226b kyis tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa /
K10D0122_H0124:226b-1: chos rnams rang bzhin rnam dag pas //
K10D0122_H0124:226b-2: dngos po med pa'i 'du shes bsgom //
K10D0122_H0124:226b-3: byang chub sems dang rab ldan pas //
K10D0122_H0124:226b-4: snying rje chen po'i 'du shes bsgom //
K10D0122_H0124:226b-5: chos rnams rang bzhin 'od gsal bas //
K10D0122_H0124:226b-6: dmigs pa med pa'i 'du shes bsgom //
K10D0122_H0124:226b-7: dngos po thams cad mi rtag pas //
K10D0122_H0124:226b-8: chags pa med pa'i 'du shes bsgom //
K10D0122_H0124:226b-9: sems ni ye shes 'byung ba'i rgyu //
K10D0122_H0124:226b-10: sangs rgyas gzhan du ma tshol cig /
K10D0122_H0124:226b-11: bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /
K10D0122_H0124:226b-12: byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha'i snying po la sogs
K10D0122_H0124:226b-13: pa'i 'khor 'dus pa thams cad rab tu dga' mgu
K10D0122_H0124:226b-14: yi rang nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la
